duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop deep expertise in assigned Salesforce modules, including learning existing architecture, integrations, and automation to support, maintain, and enhance the system.
Become an expert in business processes to develop and improve Salesforce-powered solutions.
Build and maintain custom applications on the SFDC platform, including data models, business logic, user interface, and workflows.
Perform Salesforce administrator functions such as user management, profiles, roles, permissions, validation rules, assignment rules, queues, licenses, capacity, and storage management.
Provide production support and troubleshooting, generate release notes, perform testing of new functionality, and contribute to Learning and Development training deliverables.

Execute Change Management process, complete regular system audits, and preparations for upgrades, and stay current with new features and functionality to provide technical guidance and feasibility for system enhancements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
